Title: Safety and Accountability of Fast-motorized and Electric (S.A.F.E.) Vehicles Speed Act
Summary: Requires all vehicles that are capable of traveling over twenty-five miles per hour to be registered and licensed with the department of motor vehicles.
LawCode: Add ยง1229-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring the registration and licensing of vehicles that have the ability to travel over twenty-five miles per hour
